DefaultReaderConfiguration.fullDescription: Collects application-specific events from devices with Savant Protection installed on them.

file.toolTipText: Directory or path to read from

string.toolTipText: Hostname of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

integer.toolTipText: Port number of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

select.toolTipText: Data routing (normalized alerts to Manager and/or raw data to nDepth)

integer.toolTipText: Number of seconds between log reads

FastPattern.description: 17, ServiceInfo: Mode Change from RFA action
FastPattern.pattern: CEF:0\|Savant Protection\|Savant\|[\d.]+\|\d+\|Mode Change from RFA action\|

FastPattern.description: 31, FileAudit: Filter matched and applied action act=Authorize
FastPattern.pattern: CEF:0\|Savant Protection\|Savant\|[\d.]+\|\d+\|Filter matched and applied action\|.* act=Authorize

FastPattern.description: 32, ServiceWarning: Informational msg=Corruption detection on database load
